name: 東方靈異伝　～ Highly Responsive to Prayers
description: Anex86 emulator, runs well with wine
notes:
get anex86.bmp font and set it in config of anex86
For running the game, select the HDI then run. 
Full screen does not work. but streching the window out does.

files.file2: N/A:Provide the HDI file for the first game

content:
exe: anex86.exe
files:
- file1:
    filename: a.7z
    url: https://github.com/romjacket/Anex86/raw/master/Anex86.7z
- file2: N/A:Provide the HDI file for the first game
- file3: N/A:Provide anex86.bmp font file
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    file: $CACHE/a.7z
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: file2
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: file3
